00057     ActorRigid::ActorRigid (Real mass, String name, String file, String group, World* _World) : ActorBase (name, file, group, _World)
00058     {
00059         this->CreateRigidObject(mass);
00060     }
00061 
00062     ActorRigid::~ActorRigid ()
00063     {
00064         delete physrigidbody;
00065     }
00066 
00067     void ActorRigid::CreateRigidObject (Real pmass)
00068     {
00069         btScalar bmass=pmass;
00070         this->physrigidbody = new btRigidBody (bmass, this->MotionState, this->Shape);
00071         CollisionObject=physrigidbody;
00072     }
00073 
00074     void ActorRigid::PerformConvexDecomposition(unsigned int depth, float cpercent, float ppercent)
00075     {
00076         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00077         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00078         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00079         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00080 
00081         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00082         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00083         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00084 
00085         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00086         Ogre::Real* vertices = new Ogre::Real[vertexData->vertexCount*3];
00087         unsigned int* indices = new unsigned int[indexData->indexCount];
00088         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00089         int vcount=0;
00090         float* pReal = NULL;
00091         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j+=3, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00092         {
00093             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00094             vertices[j] = pReal[0];
00095             vertices[j+1] = pReal[1];
00096             vertices[j+2] = pReal[2];
00097             vcount+=3;
00098         }
00099         vBuffer->unlock();
00100         size_t index_offset = 0;
00101         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00102 
00103         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00104         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00105 
00106         if (use32bitindexes)
00107         {
00108             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00109             {
00110                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00111             }
00112         }
00113         else
00114         {
00115             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00116             {
00117                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00118             }
00119         }
00120         iBuffer->unlock();
00121 
00122         ConvexDecomposition::DecompDesc desc;
00123         desc.mVcount = vcount;
00124         desc.mTcount = triCount;
00125         desc.mVertices = &vertices[0];
00126         desc.mIndices = &indices[0];
00127         unsigned int maxv  = 16;
00128         float skinWidth    = 0.0;
00129         desc.mDepth        = depth;
00130                 desc.mCpercent     = cpercent;
00131                 desc.mPpercent     = ppercent;
00132                 desc.mMaxVertices  = maxv;
00133                 desc.mSkinWidth    = skinWidth;
00134 
00135         internal::PhysConvexDecomposition decomp;
00136         desc.mCallback = &decomp;
00137 
00138         ConvexBuilder cb(desc.mCallback);
00139         cb.process(desc);
00140 
00141         btCompoundShape* compound = new btCompoundShape(false);
00142         btTransform trans;
00143         trans.setIdentity();
00144         for (int i=0;i<decomp.m_convexShapes.size();i++)
00145         {
00146             btVector3 centroid = decomp.m_convexCentroids[i];
00147             trans.setOrigin(centroid);
00148             btConvexHullShape* convexShape = decomp.m_convexShapes[i];
00149             compound->addChildShape(trans,convexShape);
00150         }
00151         Shape=compound;
00152         this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00153 
00154         delete[] vertices;
00155         delete[] indices;
00156 
00157         return;
00158     }
00159 
00160     void ActorRigid::AddObjectToWorld (World *TargetWorld, btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* btWorld)
00161     {
00162         btWorld->addRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00163         AttachToGraphics();
00164     }
00165 
00166     void ActorRigid::RemoveObjectFromWorld(World* TargetWorld, btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* btWorld)
00167     {
00168         btWorld->removeRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00169         this->DetachFromGraphics();
00170     }

00172     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshDynamic(short unsigned int accuracy)
00173     {
00174         if(accuracy==1)
00175         {
00176             delete Shape;
00177             /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00178             btConvexShape *tmpshape = new btConvexTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00179             btShapeHull *hull = new btShapeHull(tmpshape);
00180             btScalar margin = tmpshape->getMargin();
00181             hull->buildHull(margin);
00182             tmpshape->setUserPointer(hull);
00183             btConvexHullShape* convexShape = new btConvexHullShape();
00184             for (int b=0;b<hull->numVertices();b++)
00185             {
00186                 convexShape->addPoint(hull->getVertexPointer()[b]);
00187             }
00188             delete tmpshape;
00189             delete hull;
00190             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00191             mass=1/mass;
00192             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00193             convexShape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00194             Shape = convexShape;
00195             this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(0.95,0.95,0.95));
00196             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00197             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00198             return;
00199         }
00200         if(accuracy==2)
00201         {
00202             delete Shape;
00203             int depth=5;
00204             float cpercent=5;
00205             float ppercent=15;
00206             this->PerformConvexDecomposition(depth,cpercent,ppercent);
00207 
00208             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00209             mass=1/mass;
00210             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00211             Shape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00212             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00213             return;
00214         }
00215         if(accuracy==3)
00216         {
00217             delete Shape;
00218             int depth=7;
00219             float cpercent=5;
00220             float ppercent=10;
00221             this->PerformConvexDecomposition(depth,cpercent,ppercent);
00222 
00223             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00224             mass=1/mass;
00225             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00226             Shape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00227             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00228             return;
00229         }
00230         if(accuracy==4)
00231         {
00232             delete Shape;
00233             btGImpactMeshShape* gimpact = new btGImpactMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00234             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00235             mass=1/mass;
00236             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00237             gimpact->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00238             gimpact->setLocalScaling(btVector3(1.f,1.f,1.f));
00239             gimpact->setMargin(0.04);
00240             gimpact->updateBound();
00241             Shape=gimpact;
00242             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00243             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00244             return;
00245         }
00246         return;
00247     }
00248 
00249     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshStatic()
00250     {
00251         delete Shape;
00252 
00253         /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00254         btBvhTriangleMeshShape *tmpshape = new btBvhTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh(),true);
00255         this->Shape=tmpshape;
00256         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(0.95,0.95,0.95));
00257         this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00258     }
00259 
00260     void ActorRigid::LimitMovementOnAxis(bool x, bool y, bool z)
00261     {
00262         btVector3 LinFact(x,y,z);
00263         this->physrigidbody->setLinearFactor(LinFact);
00264         return;
00265     }
